snippet: The shooting occurred during a regular monthly meeting in Ross Township, Pa., and the gunman was tackled and shot with his own gun before being taken into custody, a witness said.
abstract: Man opens fire at township meeting in Ross Township, Pennsylvania, killing three people and injuring two others; gunman is tackled and shot with his own gun before being taken into custody.
lead_paragraph: The shooting occurred during a regular monthly meeting in Ross Township, Pa., and the gunman was tackled and shot with his own gun before being taken into custody, a witness said.

headline.main: 3 Are Shot to Death at a Township Meeting in Pennsylvania
headline.print_headline: 3 Are Shot to Death at a Township Meeting in Pennsylvania
